# nat-tooltip



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Tooltip component for displaying helpful information on hover

## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                                   | Type                                     | Default     |
| ----------- | ------------ | --------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `content`   | `content`    | Tooltip content (alternative to default slot) | `string`                                 | `undefined` |
| `disabled`  | `disabled`   | Disable tooltip                               | `boolean`                                | `false`     |
| `hideDelay` | `hide-delay` | Hide delay in milliseconds                    | `number`                                 | `100`       |
| `placement` | `placement`  | Tooltip placement                             | `"bottom" \| "left" \| "right" \| "top"` | `'top'`     |
| `showDelay` | `show-delay` | Show delay in milliseconds                    | `number`                                 | `200`       |
| `size`      | `size`       | Tooltip size                                  | `"lg" \| "md" \| "sm"`                   | `'md'`      |
| `trigger`   | `trigger`    | Trigger method                                | `"click" \| "focus" \| "hover"`          | `'hover'`   |


## Slots

| Slot        | Description                       |
| ----------- | --------------------------------- |
|             | Tooltip content                   |
| `"trigger"` | Element that triggers the tooltip |


----------------------------------------------
